"'Hollow'" is a song by the heavy metal group Pantera from the 1992 album
[[Vulgar Display of Power]]. A live medley of "Hollow" and another Pantera song,
"Domination", is featured on [[Official Live: 101 Proof]] as "Dom/Hollow".
